name: TOG
description:
Originally called That One Game, TOG is a chaotic, multiplayer shooter about destroying your mates in interactive maps! Ruin friendships, get an ego boost and more in this fight club of up to 4 round lil players. Featuring a simple, join or create room by name system, joining your mates and kicking some peculiarly round shaped butt is easy! We even support Discord invites and Xbox controllers! (Game is actively in development, and may contain a couple of small bugs.)

Keyboard controls:

  • A/D: Move left and right
  • W: Jump (hold to jump higher)
  • Left Click: Fire
  • Right Click: Dash

Side Note: We're currently working on an auto-patcher for the game, so tune into our Discord server (https://invite.gg/tog) to know when this happens and you dont have to redownload it each time we update it!
